short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly send predefined WhatsApp messages from browser extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsApp Quick Messages is a simple and efficient tool designed to enhance your messaging experience on WhatsApp Web. With predefined templates and easy-to-use functionality, you can send quick, formatted messages to your contacts with just one click. Ideal for professionals, businesses, and anyone looking to save time while communicating effectively.

Key Features:

Send predefined messages instantly.
Easy setup with WhatsApp Web integration.
User-friendly interface with categorized message templates.
Supports clipboard functionalities for copying messages.
Start using WhatsApp Quick Messages today and improve your productivity in communication!
